item.title: What I learnt in my first six months as a working (self-taught) developer
item.description: The first six months of a developer are maybe the most challenging. This is what I learnt. My mistakes and accomplishments, to become a better dev
item.author: undefined (Alex Buaiscia)

item.title: How I transitioned from humanistic jobs to tech and development and why it is possible to start from the basics.
item.description: Transitioning from literature and languages to tech was not easy. Making a career from basic roles to developer is possible, and even better sometimes.
item.author: undefined (Alex Buaiscia)
